ruleContent.replaceRegex:
<js>
m=[];n=[];
function x(a,b){m.push(a);n.push(b)}
x(/Gui头/gi,"龟头");
x(/Jing液/gi,"精液");
for(i in n){result=result.replace(m[i],n[i])}
</js>
